doc:
Melissa McBride https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melissa_McBride 0 Melissa Suzanne McBride (born May 23, 1965) is an American actress and former casting director, best known for her role as Carol Peletier on the AMC series The Walking Dead. McBride has garnered critical acclaim and received multiple awards and nominations for her role on the show. Melissa_Suzanne_McBride ( born May_23_,_1965 ) is an_American_actress and former_casting_director , best_known for her_role as Carol_Peletier on the_AMC_series The_Walking_Dead . McBride has_garnered critical_acclaim and received multiple_awards_and_nominations for her_role on the_show .
